hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.subtitle: 14+ years building software solutions
hero.description: Seasoned full-stack programmer specializing in Laravel, Vue.js, and modern web technologies. Experienced in ecommerce, retail, telecom, and DevOps.

about.title: About Me
about.text: As a seasoned full-stack programmer, I bring over 14 years of experience developing diverse software solutions across ecommerce, retail, and telecom industries. For the past 7 years, I've specialized in Laravel Framework, building end-user applications and middleware integrations. My expertise includes Vue.js, .NET (C#), Java, Ionic Framework, and cloud AI services like AWS Textract and Google Cloud Vision.

jobs.description: Development and maintenance of internal management systems. Integration of third-party biometric solutions. Implementation of DevOps tools for QA and Dev environments.
Development of web platforms using Laravel and Vue.js. Mobile development with Ionic Framework. Presale activities, technical leadership, and DevOps responsibilities.
Development of PHP/JavaScript framework. Requirements gathering and implementation of support systems.
Designed and developed OSS for infrastructure monitoring. DevOps tasks for troubleshooting infrastructure issues.
jobs.stack: ASP .NET, C#, Java, SQL Server, Oracle, Netcool/Ã“mnibus

items.title: Point of Sale Systems
items.description: Technical support and optimization for restaurant POS infrastructure, including transaction reconciliation, inventory discrepancy tracking, and automated reporting systems.

items.title: Telecom OSS Platform
items.description: Development of Operational Support Systems for telecom infrastructure, including network element monitoring, automated health-check scripts, trouble ticketing, and SMS service monitoring daemons.

items.title: Fleet Security & Tracking
items.description: Comprehensive mobile security platform for cargo and personnel transport monitoring. Features real-time GPS tracking, photographic evidence capture, route reporting, and centralized service management.
items.stack: Laravel, MySQL, Google Maps API, Ionic Framework

items.title: Enterprise Network Access Automation
items.description: Automated WiFi guest access management system integrating SAP patient records with Cisco ISE network infrastructure using HL7 messaging for seamless provisioning and deprovisioning.
items.stack: Laravel, Java SE, SQL Server, Cisco ISE APIs, Ionic

items.title: AI-Powered Product Data Extraction
items.description: Intelligent OCR solution using AWS Textract and Google Vision AI to automate product information extraction from packaging photos, improving data quality and reducing manual entry time.
items.stack: Laravel, Livewire, MySQL, AWS Textract, Google Vision API

items.title: Donation Management Platform
items.description: Open-source e-commerce platform customized for non-profit organizations to manage donations, track contributions, and support social welfare initiatives.

items.title: Biometric Population Management
items.description: Comprehensive biometric registration and tracking platform with third-party device integration, featuring microservices architecture for personal data management, biometric capture, and activity monitoring.

items.title: Gatolectivo.org
items.description: Founding member and core contributor to a collaborative animal welfare organization. Led the digital transformation by developing the first website and social network platform, managing community engagement across social media channels, and building strategic partnerships with local businesses to support animal rescue initiatives.
items.stack: Web Development, Social Media, Community Building, Volunteer Coordination
